targets.query: SELECT mean("duration") FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "result" = 'OK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum(value) from (SELECT max("active") as value FROM "30d"."users" WHERE ("testEnvironment"::tag =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest"::tag =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "nodeName"::tag, "scenario"::tag) where $timeFilter group by time($__interval)

select sum(value) from (SELECT max("active") as value FROM "30d"."users" WHERE ("testEnvironment"::tag =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest"::tag =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "nodeName"::tag, "scenario"::tag) where $timeFilter group by time($__interval), "nodeName"

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "result" = 'OK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "result" = 'KO') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "result" = 'OK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "result" = 'KO') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"

SELECT count("duration") FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "result" = 'KO') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "errorMessage"

SELECT count("duration")  / 10 FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "result" = 'KO') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name", "errorMessage"

SELECT count("duration")  as "OK" FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "result" = 'OK' AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT count("duration") as "KO"  FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "result" = 'KO' AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

panels.title: Number of requests OK vs KO

targets.query: SELECT (CUMULATIVE_SUM(mean("failed"))  /  CUMULATIVE_SUM(mean("total")) ) * 100 FROM "30d"."gatling-throughput"  WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter group by time(10s) fill(0)

SELECT mean("duration"), min("duration"), percentile("duration", 50), percentile("duration", 90), percentile("duration", 99), max("duration"), count("duration") FROM "30d"."requests" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "result" = 'OK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

SELECT mean("cq_mean_response_time") FROM "30d"."gatling-percentiles" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "result" = 'OK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

SELECT mean("cq_max_response_time") FROM "30d"."gatling-percentiles" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "result" = 'OK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

SELECT mean("cq_stddev_response_time") FROM "30d"."gatling-percentiles" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "result" = 'OK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

SELECT mean("cq_50pct_response_time") FROM "30d"."gatling-percentiles" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "result" = 'OK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

SELECT mean("cq_90pct_response_time") FROM "30d"."gatling-percentiles" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "result" = 'OK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

SELECT mean("cq_99pct_response_time") FROM "30d"."gatling-percentiles" WHERE ("simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "result" = 'OK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

list.definition: show tag values  from requests with key="systemUnderTest"
list.name: system_under_test
list.query: show tag values  from requests with key="systemUnderTest"

list.definition: show tag values from requests with key="testEnvironment" where "systemUnderTest" =~ /$system_under_test/
list.name: test_environment
list.query: show tag values from requests with key="testEnvironment" where "systemUnderTest" =~ /$system_under_test/

list.definition: show tag values from requests with key= "simulation" where "systemUnderTest" =~ /$system_under_test/ and "testEnvironment" =~ /$test_environment/
list.name: simulation
list.query: show tag values from requests with key= "simulation" where "systemUnderTest" =~ /$system_under_test/ and "testEnvironment" =~ /$test_environment/
